roleset.name: translate a coded message into readable message

role.descr: end state, translation when separate mention from arg 1

example.name: passive
example.text: My brother Misu, it seems that your insults are of two kinds: one encoded and the other decoded .

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: I decoded first from hex into Base 64, and then I took that and decoded it from Base 64 into text.

roleset.note: DECODE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'translate'. (from decode.01-v)
